info.title: E-Commerce Backend (RESTful APIs)
info.description:
E-Commerce RESTful APIs Postman documentation, see the example to know how to use. ##### **ENDPOINT** - **LOCAL (DEVELOPMENT)** : ***http://localhost:3000/api/v1*** - **CLOUD (PRODUCTION)** : ***https://blanja-api.up.railway.app/api/v1*** ##### **OPTIONAL** | Path | Method | Description | | :-------: | :---------: | :-----------: | | /:type/:value | PUT | Type: Parameter type (order by)
Value: Parameter value (order value) | | /:type/:value | DELETE | Type: Parameter type (order by)
Value: Parameter value (order value) | | Query | Value | Description | | :---: | :---: | :---------: | | search | batman | Keyword data | | limit | 10 | Limit data | | page | 1 | Page number | | sortBy[OBJECT_KEY] | asc | Sort by object key of variables (Default is ['id'] within value ascending) |

tags.name: Account
tags.description: Account route path, use this path for getting  logged session on your client

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description:
Auth route path, use this path for make authentication on your client

##### **OPTIONAL**

| Variables | Description |
| :-------: | :---------: |
|     image     | User profile image |
|     phone     | Seller phone number |
|     store     | Seller store name |
|     balance     | User Balance (Default is 0) |
|     role     | User role (Default is member) |
|     status     | User status (Default is ACTIVE) |

tags.name: Banner
tags.description:
Banner route path, use this path for make banner or ads on your client

##### **OPTIONAL**

| Variables | Description |
| :-------: | :---------: |
|     image     | Banner ads image |
|     status     | Banner status (Default is ACTIVE) |

tags.name: Category
tags.description:
Category route path, use this path for make category of product on your client

##### **OPTIONAL**

| Variables | Description |
| :-------: | :---------: |
|     status     | Category status (Default is ACTIVE) |

tags.name: Product
tags.description:
Product route path, use this path for make product on your client

##### **OPTIONAL**

| Variables | Description |
| :-------: | :---------: |
|     discount     | Product discount price number |
|     status     | Product status (Default is ACTIVE) |

tags.name: Transaction
tags.description:
Transaction route path, use this path for make transaction on your client

##### **OPTIONAL**

| Variables | Description |
| :-------: | :---------: |
|     detail     | Transaction details |
|     status     | Transaction status (Default is PENDING) |

tags.name: User
tags.description:
User route path, use this path for make users on your client

##### **OPTIONAL**

| Variables | Description |
| :-------: | :---------: |
|     image     | User profile image |
|     phone     | Seller phone number |
|     store     | Seller store name |
|     balance     | User Balance (Default is 0) |
|     role     | User role (Default is member) |
|     status     | User status (Default is ACTIVE) |
